title: AASQ #107: What tire profile is best for cornering? Rounded or Square?
content:
We know, there’s no such thing as a stupid question. But there are some questions you might not want to ask your local shop or riding buddies. AASQ is our weekly series where we get to the bottom of your questions – serious or otherwise. This time we discuss mountain bike tire profiles! Hit the […]
